company_description: Sorare is a fantasy football platform that allows users to collect, trade, and manage virtual football player cards, participating in fantasy football leagues and tournaments based on real-life player performance.
founders: Adrien Montfort, Fabian Estrada, Nicolas Julia
embedding_text: Sorare is a fantasy football platform that allows users to collect, trade, and manage virtual football player cards, participating in fantasy football leagues and tournaments based on real-life player performance.
